use_case: Complete business automation for online courses businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Online Courses business owners, education & childcare professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for online courses businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the online courses industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for online courses services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Online Courses businesses wanting to automate operations
New online courses businesses needing a complete system
Established education & childcare companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Online Courses Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Online Courses Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
